sentences.sentence: Ukraine and Croatia have agreed on the possibility of using Croatian ports on the Danube and the Adriatic Sea for the export of Ukrainian grain.

sentences.sentence: The deal was part of talks between the two countries' foreign ministers in Kyiv. Russian airstrikes have destroyed an estimated 180,000 metric tons of grain crops in the space of nine days this month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Two weeks ago, Moscow pulled out of a grain deal that had allowed safe passage of food exports through the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ukraine is a major exporter of grain, and the deal, brokered by the United Nations and Turkey last year, kept people fed all over the world.

sentences.sentence: President Idris Deby first met with General Abdur Rahman Chiani, the head of the Presidential Guards Unit, who declared himself Niger's new ruler on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The military junta has accused former colonial power France of plotting a military intervention to reinstate deposed Mohamed Bazoum, as tensions in the region continued to grow in the wake of the coup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: France has denied any intention of military intervention in the West African country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The regional group ECOWAS announced travel and economic sanctions against Niger on Sunday and said it would use force if the coup leaders don't reinstate Bazoum within a week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The European Union has cut all security cooperation and aid to Niger, while Washington has warned that U.S. assistance depends on continued democratic governance in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Myanmar's military rulers have announced a pardon for former civilian leader Aung San Suu Kyi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: She has been in detention since being ousted in a coup in 2021.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Aung was sentenced to 33 years in prison for a range of offences including bribery.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The pardon concerns five of the 19 convictions against her and it was not immediately clear whether it would allow her release she was one of 7,000 prisoners granted clemency by the military leadership a day after it announced a six-month extension to the country's state of emergency inflation is down in the 20 countries that use the euro,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: dropping to 5.3% in July, its lowest rate since January 2022. The decrease from 5.5% the month earlier comes as the eurozone economy has also increased modestly after months of stagnation, seeing a 0.3% growth in the April to June period compared to the beginning of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Although that increase was spurred on in part because of Ireland's growth of 3.3%, which may have distorted the overall picture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And without it, the zone would have only seen a modest 0.1% jump.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Starting today, France is ending the systematic printing of paper receipts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This measure, which also applies to credit card receipts, has been taken in the name of the environment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The move has been criticized by some, who say in many households sale receipts are a tool for managing the family budget.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But customers will still be able to request a printout if they want it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: After decades of conflict, Armenia and Azerbaijan are engaged in delicate peace talks, brokered by the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The process involves talks with both Azerbaijan'sbaijan's president ilham aliev and armenia's prime minister nicole pashinyan the two leaders sat down with euronews's chief international correspondent annalise borges for global conversation yeah i think it is right thing to be hopeful but if we see a constructive approach from Armenian side, and most important, if they totally put down all their aspirations to contest our territorial integrity, then we can find a peace solution very soon, maybe even by the end of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: While deep differences remain, Prime Minister Pashian acknowledges negotiators face a historic obligation to their people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: There is one thing that is very important for the Armenian and Azerbaijani communities to be in harmony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Both the Armenian and Azerbaijani communities must demand peace from their governments. You can see the interviews in full on Global Conversation on Euronews TV and digital and on our affiliate channels from 7.m. Central European time, Tuesday.

sentences.sentence: American actor Angus Clyde has died at his family home in Oakland, California.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: No cause of death has been given. The 25-year-old was said to have been struggling after burying his father in Ireland last week. Clyde played drug dealer Fez Coe in 17 episodes of the hit HBO drama Euphoria.
